titleStmt.title: Directions for the right receiving of the Lords Supper drawn up by way of question and answer for the use and benefit of the younger sort, especially the citizens of Exeter / by J.B.
titleStmt.author: J. B.

notesStmt.note: Some pages tightly bound and print is missing on p. 75 of filmed copy. Pages 60-end photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
